post.body: http://twitpic.com/r4kn - Http://www.NewsOrViews.com spokesperson.
I think we've found our spokesperson. http://twitpic.com/r4kn
NewsOrViews welcomes Dimitriy R. To the software development team.
NewsOrViews welcomes Roy A. To the software development team.
Providing NewsOrViews.com demo to Holland Solutions Group
NewsOrViews.com is proud to welcome John C to the development team. He is lending his expertise to improve NOV's RSS offerings
Total code overhaul is nearly complete.Beta launch is in site.For the patient users...Thank You. For the impatient ones..."THANK YOU!" :)
FAQ: The most frequently asked question by our beta users as they suggest items for the FAQ page is..."What questions do I frequently ask?"
Schooltube.com prepares for launch of their new version with the assistance of NewsOrViews.com
Test user calls NewsOrViews "A blog on steroids".I like that.Disclamer:We here at NOV do not condone the use of performance enhancing drugs.
Jose Chojun, Jose Ramirez, and Jose Luis have moved from NewsOrViews to other software projects with the company...The Jose's will be missed
Adding full color and logo customization to the header of 'News Or Views'
Response to AB Buyout: Shamu to start receiving commands in Flemish. :)
Adding new PodCast capability to newsorviews.com
working on comments feature for newsorviews.com
Empowering the Independent Journalist!
Just left meeting with Tom Stites, Pulitzer Prize winning journalist of http://www.BanyanProject.com
Integrating Clicky Analytics into NewsOrViews so every user site can track stats on site, mobile, or iphone
Just finished presentation to faculty at the Reynolds Journalism Institute at University of Missouri in Columbia. http://twitpic.com/ton7
EPIC 2014: Evolving Personalized Information Construct. http://tinyurl.com/5sa5c3
Meeting with Bill Densmore of the "Information Valet Project" and the "Media Giraffe Project" http://newshare.typepad.com/about.html
Yahli has joined the NewsOrViews.com / Twaitter.com graphics team. Ran a marathon yesterday, but still found the energy to work on Twaitter.
Installing InstantForum.NET for the NewsOrViews Community. This is a software package from folks at http://www.instantasp.co.uk/
Peek at the new Twaitter.com page designs: http://www.twaitter.com/images/homepage.jpg , http://www.twaitter.com/images/accounthome.jpg
Installing InstantKB for the NewsOrViews knowledge base . This is a software package from folks at http://www.instantasp.co.uk/
Just pushed out Twaitter.com splash screen. http://www.twaitter.com/
Twittering Twaitter.com related items over on the Twitter account "Twaitting" if you wish to follow
Jose C (who has worked with us before) will be joining the team once again.Very happy to have him. He is the mind behind the windowing tools
Dmitriy R is moving on to another position. He has been a great addition to the team and his contributions were many. He will be missed.
In an attempt to make the occasional error fun (a bad play on words): http://www.newsorviews.com/Images/error3.jpg
In an attempt to make the occasional error fun (ticking off the site admistrator): http://www.newsorviews.com/Images/error1.jpg
In an attempt to make the occasional error fun (hero): http://www.newsorviews.com/Images/error4.jpg
In an attempt to make the occasional error fun (ninjas): http://www.newsorviews.com/Images/error2.jpg
#Q What feature(s) does your blog lack that you wish it had?
Met with Webcentric journalist Jane Stevens of ReJourno. She's doing some amazing things. http://tinyurl.com/a3fkzu
Meet Twaitty: http://twitpic.com/uegh
